a wrapper around terra::makeTiles for setting the domain of a project

mason.Rd

for projects with large spatial domains or using relatively high resolution data, this will help

you make virtual tiles which do not need to be held in memory for the project.

Usage

mason(path, pathOut, tile_cellsV)

Arguments

path

the input directory with all geographic data.

pathOut

the output directory for the final data product to go. Fn will automatically create folders for each product type.

tile_cellsV

output of make_tiles

On this page
